title: Police curfew imposed in several areas in Colombo
body_lines: Police curfew has been imposed in Colombo North, South, Colombo Central and Nugegoda police areas until further notice due to the tense situation that erupted outside the private residence of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa today evening.
Also, the curfew has also been imposed within Kelaniya and Mount Lavinia police areas.
